title: Even cowboys
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, Sue Byrne, Joanne Hamilton, Tanya Uren and Noellie Taylor
brief_description: A look at a travelling wild west routine that goes from the prosaic to the ridiculous. From Bendigo to Wangaratta and the potholes incurred when rivals come up against stiff opposition.
